p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: We offer a multispecialty academic campus providing hands-on clinical training and curriculum beyond clinical radiology, a medium-sized residency training program that is large enough to absorb the impact of night and weekend responsibilities yet small enough to provide one-on-one attention for each resident. Each year we perform over 500,000 exams, ranging from tertiary referral and indigent care to advanced oncology and nationally recognized transplant services. 100% ABR pass rate.
